TopicTitle: Boy am I glad I found this game!

Articles.Content:
Hello all, would just like to introduce myself to the forums, and to say how impressed I am with this wonderful piece of software. I actually bought the game for my son, but since then I have spent more time with it than he has! Being able to tinker with rocketry and trying to figure out the logistics involved in landing something somewhere else is a truly wonderful experience.

Its so refreshing to see a 'game' (though I wouldn't really refer to it as that, there needs to be a new word) like this these days, congratulations to Squad, keep up the good work, so happy to be onboard!!

Steve
You sound as cheerful about the game as the Kerbals themselves. Welcome to the forum.

Welcome!

We could call it "Space Simulation Software with massive Explosions and Stuff" instead of "Game"

Anyway, already have like over thousands of hours on the game and i still love it (since 0.16).
